788:4: skandhā donārabhya kati kasmādityevamādiṣu cintā sthāneṣu kauśalyakaraṇārtham |
788:7: śamathānukūlyaṃ punareṣū sthāneṣu kṛtakauśalasya niḥsaṃdehatayā yatheṣṭamālaṃvane ai kāgrayayogena sukhaṃ cittasamā dhānataḥ |
788:8: vipaśyanāvṛddhayānu kūlyaṃ bahubhiḥ prakāraiḥ jñeyaparīkṣayā prajñāprakarṣagamanataḥ |
788:9: sāṃkathyaviniścayānuśaṃsa eṣu sthāneṣu kuśa lasya sarvapraśnavyākaraṇaśaktiyogādvaiśāradyapratilaṃbhato draṣṭavyaḥ ||
788:12: saparigrahadehagrahaṇena bāhyasyādhyātmikasya ca rūpaskandhasya grahaṇaṃ veditavyam |
788:38: idaṃ cedaṃ cetyasthiśaṃkalā dikaṃ jñeyavastusabhāgaṃ pratibimbam |
788:39: evaṃ caivaṃ ceti varṇasaṃsthānabhedaiḥ citrīkārateti tathāsaṃjñā |
788:43: tathāhi śubhānāmaśubhānāṃ vā vipāka ālayavi jñānaṃ nityamupekṣayaiva saṃprayuktaṃ bhavati |
788:54: yacca tasya cakṣuṣo bījamupacitamālayavijñānaṃ yata āyatyāṃ cakṣunirvartiṣyate,
788:58: yaccakṣurdhātoḥ rūpe ādhipatyamiti rūpī ndriyādhipatyena bāhyaviṣayanirvartanāt |
788:59: taddhātuvaddraṣṭavyaṃ tacca yathāyogamiti yena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyati yacca tadbījamityevamādi yojayitavyam ||
788:65: vṛttihetutvaṃ bhūtāni pratyākhyāyopādāyarūpasya pṛthagdeśā vaṣṭambhasāma rthyābhāvāt |
788:70: lakṣaṇataḥ saṃniveśato 'nugrahopaghātataḥ kriyāsaṃniśrayataḥ kriyālakṣaṇataḥ maṇḍanataśca caturṇā daśānāmaṣṭānāmekai kasya ca yathākramam |
788:89: spraṣṭavyaikadeśavyavasthānamāmarśanata ātulanataḥ sparśanata āpīḍanataḥ saṃsargato dhātuvaiṣamya sāmyataśca |
788:107: avyavahārakuśalasyāśikṣita bhāṣatayā rūpe saṃjñā bhavati na tu rūpamiti |
788:109: animittadhātusamāpannasya rūpādisarva nimittā pagate'nimitte nirvāṇe saṃjñā'nimittasaṃjñā |
788:115: vedanāsaṃjñāvarjyānāṃ sarveṣāṃ caitasikānāṃ cittaviprayuktānāṃ ca saṃskāraskandhalakṣaṇatve cetanāmātrasyaiva tannidaśe grahaṇaṃ tatpūrvakatvāditareṣāmiti kāraṇajñāpanārthamāha - yayā kuśalatvāya cetayata ityevamādi |
788:119: cetanādīnāṃ caitasikānāṃ lakṣaṇataḥ karmataśca nirdeśo veditavyaḥ |
788:122: tathāhi yathābhisaṃskāraṃ kuśalādiṣu dharmeṣu cittasya pravṛttirbhavatīti |
788:123: ālaṃbane cittadhāraṇaṃ tatraiva punaḥ punarāvarjanaṃ veditavyam |
788:126: vijñānotpattāvindriyasya sukhādivedanotpattyanukūlo yo vikārastadākāraḥ sparśo veditavyaḥ |
788:129: ata eva tatpradhāno'nyaiḥ saṃhartu na śakyate saṃstu taṃ vastu pūrvānubhūtaṃ veditavyam |
788:139: upapattiprātilambhikaṃ śrutacintāmayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ ca yathākramaṃ vipākāgamādhigamarūpaṃ veditavyam |
788:141: sthāmavānvīryavānutsāhī dṛḍhaparākramo'nikṣiptadhuraḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣvityevamādisūtrapadāni yathākramaṃ saṃnāhādiṣvabhyutsāhavastuṣu yojayitavyāni |
788:146: sāstravā dharmā āstravā āsravasthānīyāśca viṣayā iha veditavyāḥ |
788:165: nāsti dattaṃ nāstīṣṭaṃ nāsti kṛtaṃ nāsti sucaritaṃ nāsti duścaritamityayaṃ hetvapavādaḥ |
788:166: nāsti duścaritasucaritānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipāka iti phalāpavādaḥ |
788:167: nāstyayaṃ loko nāsti paraloko nāsti mātā nāsti pitā nāsti sattva upapāduka iti kriyāpavādaḥ,
788:170: tadanyadyat kiṃcidviparītadarśanaṃ tanmithyā pari kalpanaṃ veditavyam |
788:180: tadvilakṣaṇatvāt na hi te ātmalakṣaṇā iti |
788:188: na hi vinā dehenā tmaparikalpa upalabhyata iti |
788:193: rūpāmātmeti samanupaśyati vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānamātmeti samanupaśyatītyetāḥ pañcātmadṛṣṭayaḥ |
788:198: yasya hi yadvaśena vartate dāne viniyoge vā tasya tadātmīyamityucyate |
788:202: tadyathā rajjuṃ sarpato gṛhṇāti kaścit sahasā,
788:203: na punā rajjuriti nirūpayaṃstāṃ sarpato gṛhṇīyāditi ||
788:217: śubhanimittamanusarato rāgānukūlaṃ pūrvahasitaramitakrīḍitānusmaraṇāt cittasyānupaśamo veditavyaḥ kausīdyasaṃniśrayadānakarmakatvamaśraddadhānasya prayogacchandābhāvāt |
788:222: bahirdhāvikṣepaḥ śrutādikuśale prayuktasya tadālaṃbanādbahiḥ kāmaguṇeṣu cittagamanaṃ veditavyam |
788:223: adhyātmavikṣepaḥ sa mādhiprayuktasyaiva taccyutikarau layauddhatyamāsvādanā ca |
788:224: nimittavikṣepaḥ pare māṃ guṇavattayā saṃbhāvayiṣyantītyetannimittametadartha kuśalaprayuktasya śanaiḥ tatparihāṇito veditavyaḥ |
788:225: dauṣṭhulya vikṣepo'haṃkārādidauṣṭhulyavaśādutpannotpanneṣu sukhādiṣu vediteṣvahaṃ mama asmīti vā karaṇāt kuśalapakṣāpariśuddhito veditavyaḥ |
788:227: vyavakira ṇā tadūrdhva tena cittasaṃtānasya miśrībhāvaḥ |
788:228: nimittīkāraḥ tasyaiva veditasya punaḥ punaścitrīkāro veditavyaḥ |
788:229: manaskāravikṣepaḥ samāpattyantaraṃ vā samāpadyamānasya dhyānāntaraṃ vā saṃśrayataḥ pūrvasmāddhyutthānato veditavyaḥ |
788:238: kuśalā(di) bhāvavacanaṃ na tvavaśyaṃ mohātmaka iti kṛtvā |
788:246: anabhipretaṃ karaṇaṃ parairbalādavaṣṭabhya kāryamāṇasya kleśābhibhavādvā yathāyogaṃ veditavyam |
788:252: cetanāṃ vā niśritya prajñāṃ vetyanabhyūhābhyūhāvasthāyāṃ yathākramam |
788:253: paryeṣaṇākārā manaso'bhijalpanā vitarkaḥ pratyavekṣaṇākārā manaso'bhijalpanā'nu vicāra iti ||
788:262: cittaviprayuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmadhiṣṭhānataḥ svabhāvataḥ prajñaptitaśca nirdeśo veditavyaḥ |
788:270: prāptiḥ pratilambhaḥ samāgama iti prajñaptiriti prajñaptinirdeśaḥ |
788:276: nirodha iti samāpatticittakṛtaḥ kālāntaramasthāvaracittacaittasamudācāranirodho āśrayasyāvasthāviśeṣo nirudhyate'neneti kṛtvā |
788:279: ete ca samāpattī bhūmitaḥ manaskārato'dhiṣṭhānataḥ svabhāvataḥ prajñaptitaśca nirdeṣṭe āsaṃjñikaṃ manaskāravarjairebhireva |
788:282: sthitikālaniyama iyantaṃ kālamanenāsmin nikāyasabhāge'vasthātavyaṃ varṣaśataṃ varṣasahastraṃ veti karmakṛtaḥ sāmarthyaviśeṣaḥ |
788:285: bāhyasyāpi rūpasya jātimattve nikāyasabhāgamātragrahaṇaṃ sattvasaṃtāne lakṣaṇaprajñaptijñāpanārtham |
788:286: bāhyaṃ hi rūpaṃ saṃvarttavivarttaprabhāvitamā dhyātmikāstu jātijarādiprabhāvitā iti |
788:288: ete ca jātyādayo na pratikṣaṇaṃ veditavyāḥ kiṃtarhi prabandhāvasthāsviti |
788:289: svabhāvādhivacanaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ devo manuṣya ityevamādi |
788:291: tadubhayāśrayeṣvi ti svabhāvaviśeṣādhivacanāśrayeṣvakṣareṣu a i u ityevamā daṣu |
788:292: etāvacca sarva yaduta svabhāvo vi śeṣastadubhayavyavahāraśca,
788:295: paryāyākṣaraṇatāmupādāyeti yathā cakṣuścakṣurityetasmātparyāyādanyeṣvapi netrākṣinayanalocanādiṣu paryāyāntareṣu kṣarati,
788:297: naivaṃ a ityetadakṣaraṃ a ityetaṃ paryāyaṃ mukttvā paryāyāntareṇa śakyate jñāpayitum,
788:300: prabandhānupacchede pravṛttivyavasthānamekasmin kṣaṇe vyavacchinne vā tadupacārābhāvāt hetuphalanānātvamiṣṭasya phalasya sucaritamaniṣṭasya duścaritamityevamādi |
788:305: hetuphalasya prabandhena pravṛttau satyāṃ yattatra hetuphalamutpannaniruddhaṃ so'tītaḥ kāla iti prajñapyate,
788:311: hetuphala pratyayānāṃ samavadhānaṃ tadyathā vijñānākhyasya hi hetuphalasye ndriyāparibhedo vipayābhāsagamanaṃ tajjñānaṃ manaskārapratyupasthānaṃ ceti |
788:313: ityevamete cittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ dharmāṇāma vasthāsu prajñapanātsarve prajñaptisanto veditavyāḥ |
788:330: punaḥ punaḥ pratisaṃdhibandhe ātmabhāvopādānā dādānavijñā nam |
788:334: yasmāttena vināupāttamādi spaṣṭatvaṃ bījaṃ karma na yujyate |
788:336: etasyāścoddānagāthāyā vibhāgastadyathā viniścayasaṃgrahaṇyāma ṣṭābhirākārai rālayavijñānasyāstitā pratyetavyā |
788:337: tadyathā 'ntareṇālayavijñānaṃ āśrayo pādānāsaṃbhavataḥ ādipravṛtyasaṃbhavataḥ spaṣṭapravṛttyasaṃbhavato bījatvā saṃbhavataḥ karmāsaṃbhavataḥ kāyikānubhavāsaṃbhavatā 'cittakasamāpattyasaṃbhavato vijñānacyutyasaṃbhavataśca ||
788:346: api ca ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ sā jātirnopalabhyate yā'vyākṛtavipākasaṃgṛhītā syāt |
788:349: tatra yena yenāśrayeṇa yadvijñānaṃ pravartate tadeva tenopāttaṃ syādavaśiṣṭasyānu pāttateti na yujyate,
788:352: api ca punaḥ punarāśrayasyopādāna doṣaḥ prasajyate |
788:353: tathāhi cakṣurvijñānamekadā pravartate ekadā na pravarttate evamavaśiṣṭāni |
788:355: iti pūrvakarmapravarttamānapratyahetuto'pi kuśalākuśalato'pi tajjātyanupalaṃbhato'pi pratiniyatāśrayato'pi punaḥ punaru pādānadoṣato'pi na yujyate ||
788:357: sa cetkaścidvadedyadyālaya vijñānamasti tena dvayoḥ vijñānayoḥ yugapatpravṛttirbhaviṣyati |
788:358: sa idaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ - adoṣa eva bhavāndoṣasaṃjñī |
788:361: tathāhyekatyasya yugapadradṣṭukāmasya yāvadvijñātukāmasyādi ta itaretaravijñānapravṛttirna yujyate |
788:362: tathāhi tatra manaskāro'pi nirviśiṣṭa indriyamapi viṣayo'pi ||
788:363: kena kāraṇenāsatyāṃ yugapadvijñānapravṛttau manovijñānasya cakṣurādivijñāna sahānucarasya spaṣṭatvaṃ na saṃbhavati |
788:364: tathāhi yasmin samaye 'tītamanubhūtaṃ viṣayaṃ samanusmarati tasmin samaye'vispaṣṭo manovijñānapracāro bhavati na tu tathā vartamānaviṣayo manaḥpracāro'vispaṣṭo bhavati |
788:366: kena kāraṇena bījatvaṃ na saṃbhavati ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāmanyonyam |
788:377: na ca teṣāṃ tathā bījatvaṃ yujyate |
788:380: kena kāraṇenāsatyāṃ yu gapadvijñānapravṛttau karma na saṃbhavati |
788:382: etā vijñaptayaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe yugapatpravartamānā upalabhyante |
788:383: na caikasya vijñānasyaikasmin kṣaṇe idamevaṃrūpaṃ vyatibhinnaṃ karma yujyate ||
788:385: tathāhyekatyasya yoniśo vā'yoniśo vā cintayato vā 'nuvitarkayato vā samāhitacetaso vā'samāhitacetaso vā ye kāye kāyānubhavā utpadyante'nekavidhā bahunānāprakārāste na bhaveyurupalabhyante ca |
788:388: tathāhya saṃjñisamāpannasya vā nirodhasamāpannasya vā vijñānameva kāyādapakrāntaṃ syāt |
788:392: tathāhi cyavamānasya vijñāna mūrdhvadehaṃ vā śotikurvan vijahāti,
788:395: ato'pyālayavijñānasyaiva dehopādāna kasya vigamāddehaśītatā upa[la]bhyate dehāpratisaṃvedanā ca |
788:398: mano nirvacanata ālaṃvanataḥ saṃprayogataḥ pravṛttikālataśca nirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam |
788:412: ananyathīma vatā sadaiva bhāva nāṃ nirātmatayā draṣṭavyā |
788:413: saṃkleśā pracāratāmupādāyeti tenā labanena saṃkleśa vastunaḥ saṃkleśa śūnyīkaraṇāt |
788:424: ākāśaṃ rūpābhāva iti rūpasyava viparya ye ṇābhāvalakṣaṇo yo dharmo manovijñānaviṣayastadākāśam |
788:429: te'pi śaśaviṣāṇādayo nāsyaiva vidyamānasya rūpasya viparyayeṇa,
788:434: yo nirodho na ca visaṃyoga ityanuśayāsamuddhātāt |
788:436: dvayamidaṃ prahātavyam - kleśāśca tadāśrayabhūtaṃ ca vastu veditam |
788:447: mana āyatanena sapta vijñānadhātava ityevaṃ sarvadharmāstrayo bhavanti ||
788:449: cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇānāṃ pratyekaṃ dvitve sati kathaṃ dhā tūnāṃ naikaviṃśatitvam |
788:450: yadyapi caiṣāṃ dvitvaṃ na tu dhātvantaratvam,
788:459: yathā dvayoścakṣuporunmiṣitayoḥ rūpagrahaṇaṃ spaṣṭaṃ bhavati na tathaikasminneveti |
788:460: tadyathā ekasminnapavarake dvayoḥ pradīpayorekaṃ prabhāpratānaṃ spaṣṭataraṃ dvau pradīpau niśritya varttate |
788:462: ekaikenendriyadvāreṇa vicitra viṣayapratyupasthāne tatprakāreṣu kiṃ krameṇa vijñānānyutpadyante āhosyidyugapadekam |
788:466: yathā svaprade śamavaṣṭabhya pradīpapratānavat śabdapratānasyotpādo draṣṭavyaḥ |
788:467: yattvāsannatiraskṛtasya śabdasyāspaṣṭaṃ śravaṇaṃ bhavati tacchabdasya pratighātitvādāvaraṇasauṣirya svalpokti to veditavyam ||
788:468: ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānānāṃ kati vijñānāni savikalpakāni katyavikalpakāni |
788:471: tatra svabhāvavikalpaḥ pratyutpanneṣu saṃskāreṣvanubhūyamāneṣu yaḥ svalakṣaṇākāro vikalpaḥ |
788:474: api khalu sapta vikalpāḥ ālaṃvane svarasavāho vikalpaḥ sanimitto 'nimittaḥ paryeṣakaḥ pratyavekṣakaḥ kliṣṭo 'kliṣṭaśca vikalpaḥ |
788:476: acitrayitvālaṃvanaṃ yathāsvaṃ viṣayeṣu svarase naiva vahanāt |
788:478: ani mitto'nāgataviṣayo manorathākāro vikalpaḥ śeṣā abhinirūpaṇāvikalpasvabhāvā veditavyāḥ |
788:483: yadā rūpādiprativijñaptikaṃ vijñānaṃ tatkena kāraṇena cakṣurādi vijñānamityucyate na rūpādibhijñānamiti |
788:489: tathāhi sati cakṣuṣi cakṣurvijñānamavaśyamutpadyate anandhānāmanandhato 'ndhakārasyāpi darśanāt |
788:494: tadyathā kāmala vyādhyupahatena cakṣuṣā nīlādirūpeṣvapi pītadarśanameva bhavatīti |
788:499: tathāhi vijñānasaṃprayukte nānubhavenendriya syānugraha upaghāto vā bhavati,
788:503: kiṃ tāvaccakṣū rūpāṇi paśyatīti veditavyamatha vijñānam |
788:507: api khalu ṣaḍbhirākāraiḥ cakṣuṣo rūpadarśane prādhānyaṃ veditavyaṃ na vijñānasya |
788:520: etacca yathoktaṃ sarva vijñānasya na saṃbhavatīti |
788:522: yathā dhātuṣvāyataneṣu cāsaṃskṛtaṃ vyavasthāpitamevaṃ kasmānna skandheṣvapi vyavasthāpitam |
788:524: rūpādīnā matītādi prakārābhisaṃkṣepeṇa rāśyarthaḥ skandhārtho nirdiṣṭaḥ |
788:525: sa ca nityasya na saṃbhavatīti na skandheṣvasaṃskṛtavyavasthānam ||
788:526: kena kāraṇena ta eva dharmā skandhadhātvāyatanamukhaiḥ pṛthagdeśitāḥ |
788:528: tathāhi skandhanirdeśe ye rūpavijñānesamāsena nirdiṣṭe te dhātvāyataneṣvekādaśadhā |
788:529: saptadhā ca bhittvā vyāsena nirdiṣṭe yathāyogam |
788:530: ye tu tatra vedanādayo vyastāḥ te dhātvāyataneṣu dharmadhātvāyatanatvena samastā iti |
788:533: grahaṇāya dvārabhūtasya grāhyagrāhakamātrasya vyavasthānata āyatananirdeśo veditavyaḥ |
788:539: ārūpyopapannasya pṛthagjanasya cakṣurheturiti tataḥ pracyutya rūpiṇi dhātāvupapadyamānasya yasmādālaya vijñānasaṃniviṣṭāccakṣurbījācca kṣurnirvartiṣyate,
788:541: kāyadhāturna kāya ārūpyopapannasya pṛthagjanasya yaḥ kāyadhāturityetadatra vaktavyam,
788:545: jāto bhūtaḥ nirvṛtti vṛddhi cādhikṛtya yathākramam ||
788:550: yathā vedayate tathā saṃjānīta iti yathānubhavaṃ nimittodgrahaṇāt |
788:551: yathā saṃjānīte tathā cetayati yathāsaṃjñaṃ karmā bhisaṃskaraṇāt |
788:552: yathā cetayate tathā vijñānaṃ tatra tatropagaṃ bhavatīti yathābhisaṃskāraṃ viṣayeṣu gatyantareṣu ca vijñānapariṇāmāt ||
788:553: yatra saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate ceti sendriye kāye |
788:556: yatsaṃ kliśyate vyavadāyate ceti citta dauṣṭhulyādauṣṭhulyopapattitaḥ ||
788:558: sā punaḥ apekṣātṛṣṇā abhinandanātṛṣṇā adhyavasānatṛṣṇā āmatṛṣṇā viṣayatṛṣṇā kāmatṛṣṇā samāpattitṛṣṇā duścaritaduḥkhatṛṣṇā sucaritasukhatṛṣṇā viprakṛṣṭatṛṣṇā sanikṛṣṭatṛṣṇā ca |
788:559: asyāḥ tṛṣṇāyā ālaṃvanatvena yathākramamatītādayaḥ prakārā yojitavyāḥ |
788:561: utpannānutpannabhedato grāhakagrāhyabhedato bahirmukhāntarmukhabhedataḥ kliṣṭākliṣṭabhedato viprakṛṣṭasaṃnikṛṣṭabhedataśvātītādīni yathāyogaṃ veditavyāni |
788:569: tadyathā loke yena śarīrapradeśena bhāra uhyate tatra skandhopacāro dṛṣṭaḥ,
788:574: sarvaprakāradharmasaṃgrahaṇena sūtrāntaranirdiṣṭānāṃ pṛthivīdhātvādīnāmanyeṣāmapi dhātūnāmeṣvevāṣṭādaśasu yathāyogaṃ saṃgrahaṇādveditavyam ||
788:576: rūpādānāṃ phenapiṇḍo pamatvamasato riktataḥ tucchato'sārataśca khyānādveditavyam |
788:577: eteṣāṃ punaḥ sūtrapadānāmartha ātmaśucisukhanityaviparyāsapratipakṣeṇa yathākramamanātmatā mupādāyetyevamādibhiḥ padarveditavyaḥ ||
788:578: kathaṃ kati kimarthibhiriti praśnatrayavyavasthāpanaṃ lakṣaṇavastusaṃmohayoḥ samāropasya ca prahāṇārtham |
788:579: tatra kathaṃ dravyasaditi dravyasato lakṣaṇanirdeśena tatsaṃmohaḥ prahīyate |
788:580: sarvāṇi dravyasantītyanena vastusaṃmohaḥ prahī yate ātmadravyābhiniveśatyājanārthamityanena samāropaḥ prahīyate |
788:582: abhilāpanirapekṣa indriyagocarastadyathā rūpaṃ vedanetyevamādikaṃ nāmnā'citrayitvā yasyārthasya grahaṇaṃ bhavati |
788:584: na yathā ghaṭādiṣu rūpādīnapekṣya ghaṭādibuddhiri ti ||
788:589: yena saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate ceti rāgādibhiścetasikaiḥ śraddhādibhiśceti veditavyam |
788:590: yā ca tatrāvastheti rūpacittacetasikāva sthāsu prajñaptāścittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārāḥ |
788:593: punastrayodaśavidhasya vijñānasya yo viṣayaḥ tajjñeyamanena pradarśitam |
788:594: tatpunaḥ śrutamayaṃ jñānaṃ cintāmayaṃ jñānaṃ lau kikabhāvanāmayaṃ jñānaṃ paramārthajñānaṃ paracittajñānaṃ dharmajñānam anvayajñānaṃ duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānaṃ kṣayānutpādajñānaṃ mahāyānajñānaṃ ca |
788:602: vidūṣaṇāyāsamutthāpanāyānutpāde jñāne niṣṭhāyāṃ mahārtheṣu jñānaṃ tadvidūṣaṇaṃ jñānaṃ yāvanmahārthajñānamiti yojayitavyam |
788:612: sarvakālamaparicchinnākāratvāt citrākāra vijñaptirekasyāneka ākāro vicitraśceti durvyavasthāpanādasyāḥ sūkṣmatvam |
788:613: sahabhāvavijñaptirekakālotpannāti vijñānāni kathaṃ pṛthagyathāsvaṃ viṣayaṃ paricchindantī ti durvyavasthāpanātsūkṣmatvam |
788:615: vipakṣapratipakṣalaghuparivṛttivijñaptiḥ kathaṃ rāgādisamastabandhanaṃ cittaṃ tanmuhureva sakṛdvītarāgādikaṃ bhavatīti |
788:616: vāsanāvijñaptiḥ kathaṃ karmabhiḥ samudācaradbhiḥ cittaṃ vāsyate,
788:619: phaladānaṃ ca prati krameṇa vṛttilābha iti |
788:620: pratisaṃdhivijñaptiḥ kathamanekaprakārātmabhāvanirvartakakarmaparibhāvitaṃ sadvijñānaṃ tathāpyapari sphuṭāyāṃ maraṇāvasthāyāṃ sahasā prabuddhayānyatarakarmavāsanāmanyatarasyāṃ gatau pratisaṃdhi vadhnānīti |
788:621: muktavijñaptiḥ kathamarhataścittaṃ paramaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ dharmatāprāptaṃ saṃsārocitasarvaprakārasāśravacaryā samatikrāntamanenākāreṇa vartata iti durvyavasthāpanādasyāḥ sūkṣmatvaṃ veditavyam |
788:622: draṣṭādigrahaṇena draṣṭā śrotā ghrātā svā dayitā spraṣṭā vijñātā cetyeṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ veditavyam ||
788:630: tatra rūpīti rūpaṃ tasya dharmasyātmasva bhāvastasmādasau rūpī,
788:633: bhūtāśrayato'pīti rūpāntara yogā dapi rūpitvamiti darśayati,
788:634: upādāya rūpasya bhūtarūpeṇa yogādbhatarūpāṇāṃ ca parasparami ti |

788:640: deśopadeśato'muṣyāṃ diśīti vyavadeṣṭuṃ śakyatvāt deśagocarataḥ kasmiścitpradeśe sthitasyālaṃvanībhāvāt |
788:642: dvayasamagocarataḥ sattvadvayasya samamālaṃ vanībhāvānna tvevamarūpiṇo yathātmānubhavaṃ paraiḥ parigrahītumaśakyatvāditi |
788:647: vyābādhanataḥ pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ pāṇyādisaṃsparśaiḥ śokādibhiśca yathāyogaṃ rūpaṇāt bādhanādityarthaḥ |
788:651: antarmukhato rūpāvacarasya rūpasya samāpatticittatṛṣṇāsaṃbhūtatvādata evāsya manomayatvaṃ veditavyam |
788:661: yathā rūvitadātmato'pīti vistareṇa rūpī tyuktaṃ tathā sanidarśanatadātmato'pi sanidarśanaṃ vistareṇa yojayitavyam |
788:662: tatra sarvāṇi sanidarśanāni sarva nidarśanasaṃbandhādinā'rūpiṇāmapi sanidarśanatvāt ||
788:664: āvṛṇotītyetāvati vaktavye āvri yate ceti vacanaṃ prabhādirūpasya sapratighatvavyavasthāpanārtham |
788:665: taddhayāvri yata eva nāvṛṇotītyeṣā tasya jātireṣa svabhāva ityarthaḥ |
788:667: yanna samādhivaśavarti rūpamiti samādhivaśena vartamānasyāpratighatvāt samacittaka devatāvata |
788:668: prakopapadasthānaṃ yatrāśraya ālaṃvane vā dveṣa utpadyate |
788:681: trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatana yoḥ pradeśaḥ saparivāramā ryamārga ma saṃskṛtaṃ ca hitvā ||
788:683: yāvanti sāstravāṇi tāvanti saraṇāṇītyevamādi tadānubaṃdhyārthena veditavyam ||
788:690: kāmakāreṇa saṃmukhībhāvo vimukhībhāvaśca nāsaṃskṛtasya saṃbhavati nityatvāt |
788:691: naivasaṃ skṛta nāsaṃskṛtasya dvayā vyatirekādyaduktam - dvayamidaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ cāsaṃskṛtaṃ ceti |
788:699: taccāsaṃskṛtaṃ ca sthāpayitvā trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatanayoḥ pradeśo draṣṭavyaḥ ||
788:701: sa punaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ nityādicaturvidhaviparyāsaprati pakṣatvādaviparyāsa nirvikalpatayā nirvikalpaḥ |
788:712: prabhāsvarotpannaṃ krīḍāpramoṣakāṇāṃ manaḥpradūṣakāṇāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ ca devānāṃ pramodabāhulyādbhogeṣu vihāre ca svavaśavarttanādyathāyogam |
788:717: pratibimbavibhutvanidarśanotpannaṃ jñeyaṃ vastu sabhāgaṃ vaimo kṣikaṃ tāthāgataṃ ca rūpaṃ yathākramam |
788:733: svalakṣaṇasya vartamānasya pratyekaṃ pratiniyatasya viṣayasya grāhakaṃ pañcendriyajam |
788:734: svasāmānyalakṣaṇasya sarvakālasya sarvasya viṣayasya grāhakaṃ ṣaṣṭhendriyajam ||
788:737: yattāvadgrāhakaṃ grāhyamapi tat cakṣurādīnāmapi manovijñānena grāhyatvāt |
788:745: daśānāṃ dhātūnāmiti saptānāṃ vijñānadhātūnāṃ rūpaśabdadharmadhātūnāṃ ca |
788:762: atītanirdeśādhikāreṇedamapi jñāpyate - kimartha bhagavatātītādīnyeva trīṇi kathāvastūni vyavasthāpitāni na nirvāṇamiti |
788:770: ruciḥ saṃtiṣṭhata iti na kevalaṃ rucirevopapattiprātilambhikā kiṃ tarhi saha taiḥ śraddhādibhiriti |
788:771: kuśalasya bhāvanā sarve śrutamayādayaḥ kuśalā dharmāveditavyāḥ |
788:775: tadanyaḥ kleśopakleśo duścaritasamutthāpaka iti sa punaryaḥ kāmā[va] caro'naiḥsargikaḥ,
788:779: kudṛṣṭipūrvakaṃ yatrānaśanādibhiḥ pu ṇyārthino varārthinaśca kliśyanta iti |
788:790: akliṣṭākuśalacetaso yadyasya na kliṣṭaṃ nāpi kuśalaṃ ceto bhavati,
788:795: adhigama niṣyandato'vyākṛtaṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ sahajāmiti yaiścittacaitasikaiḥ vikrīḍanārtha nirmāṇaṃ nirme mīyate |
788:802: saha samādhilābhāt prahāṇābhirativipakṣabhūtasya dauṣṭhu[lya]sya prahāṇāt pradeśavairāgyamastīti veditavyam |
788:808: caturo dhātūn dve cāyatane sthāpayitvā nantaroktāni |
788:816: satkāyavairāgyaṃ vā punaradhikṛtya śaikṣasyaikadeśavairāgyamaśaikṣasya sakalavairāgyaṃ veditavyam |
788:820: daśavairāgyāṇītyatra prātikūlyārtho vairāgyārtho veditavyonā vaśyaṃ prahāṇārthaḥ |
788:821: uccataraṃ sthānaṃ prāptavato nihīnesthāne ityuccataraṃ nagaraśraiṣṭhayādisthānaṃ prāptavato grāmamahattarādisthāne nihīne |
788:822: bālānāṃ nirvāṇa iti tasya śāntatvājñānāt satkāyābhiṣvaṅgācca |
788:823: pratilabdhadarśanamārgasya traidhātuka iti saṃskāraduḥkhatāṃ parijñātavataḥ sarvasāsrava[va]stunirvedāt |
788:824: prakṛtyā vairāgyaṃ prakṛtivairāgyaṃ yāvatprahāṇena vairāgyaṃ prahāṇa vairāgyamiti padavigrahajātirveditavyā ||
788:825: mokṣaprayuktasya kuśalaṃ śaikṣamiti saṃbhṛtasaṃbhārāvasthāyāḥ prabhṛtimokṣārtha prayuktasya veditavyam |
788:832: śaikṣasya kliṣṭāvyākṛtamityatra kliṣṭamakuśalaṃ nivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca yathāsaṃbhavam |
788:838: dṛṣṭisthānaṃ dṛṣṭisahabhuvo dharmāstadvījaṃ ca tathaiva vicikitsāsthānamapi veditavyam |
788:839: ye ca dṛṣṭau vipratipannāḥ kleśopakleśā iti ye dṛṣṭimukhena pravṛttā tadālaṃvanāśca rāgādayaḥ |
788:841: darśanaprahātavyāviparyayeṇa sāstravā iti parikalpitakliṣṭadṛṣṭayādikādanye sāstravā ityarthaḥ |
788:842: atra punaḥ sāsravagrahaṇena nirvedhabhāgīyānāmapi grahaṇaṃ veditavyaṃ dauṣṭhulyānubandhārthena |
788:853: na tu phalotpādanaṃ prati pratyayasya kācidīhetyarthaḥ |
788:855: na hyanutpādi kāraṇāt kiṃcidutpadyamānaṃ kārya siddhamiti kṛtvā |
788:856: avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityevamādi samarthapratyayotpattitāmupādāya nirīhakatvānityatve'pi sati na yataḥ kutaścit pratyayāt sarvameva phalamutpadyate,
788:859: yānyavidyādīni dvādaśāṅgāni vibhaktāni tānyeva punaḥ samasya catvāryaṅgāni bhavantyākṣepā ṅgādīni |
788:860: etāvacca pravṛttinirdeśe nirdeṣṭavyam yaduta hetukāle yenākṣipyate yaccākṣipyate phalakāle yenābhinirvartyate yaccābhinirvatyate tadetatsarvamebhiraṅgainirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam |
788:863: ākṣiptāṅgaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā ca,
788:864: tayā cittavāsanayā nāmarūpādīnā māyatyāṃ pūrvotarasaṃniśrayakrameṇābhinirvṛtaye bījapuṣṭitaḥ |
788:866: aprahīṇakāmādi tṛṣṇādi vasena kāmādiṣu sucarita duścaritaprakāra ratipūrvakeṇa chandarāgeṇa sopādāne vijñāne sati maraṇāvasthāyāṃ phaladānaṃ prati chanda rāgānurūpyāntarakarmavāsanābhimukhībhāvāt |
788:868: tena prakāreṇa karmāntaravāsanābhimukhye satyanyatarasmin gatiyonyādibhedabhinne nikāyasabhāge yathākṣipte nāmarūpādinirvṛtteḥ |
788:870: jarāmaraṇasyaikāṅgakaraṇaṃ vināpi jarāṃ maraṇa saṃbhavā t |
788:871: na tvevaṃ jarāyujāyāṃ yonau vinā nāmarūpādibhiḥ ṣaḍāyatanādīnāṃ saṃbhava ityeṣāṃ pṛthagaṅgīkaraṇaṃ veditavyam ||
788:883: yata evaṃ vicikitsati - kiṃ nvahama bhūvamati[te] 'dhvanyāhosvinnābhūvamityevamādi |
788:893: nāmarūpamātmabhāvaṃ sattvān grāhayati tannivṛttyā sattvānāṃ nikāyasabhāgāntarabha janāt |
788:894: nāmarūpā donāṃ ṣaḍāyatanādipratyayabhāvaḥ pūrvāṅgasaṃniśrayeṇottarāṅganirvṛtti to draṣṭavyaḥ |
788:909: upādānaṃ puna rbhavādānāya sopādānaṃ ca sattvānāṃ vijñānaṃ karoti,
788:920: jarāmaraṇaṃ punaḥpunarvayaḥ pariṇāmena jīvitapariṇāmena ca sattvān yojayati,
788:940: antareṇa eva kartāraṃ karma kriyā cāsti tatphalopabhogaścetyayamatra karmaphalāvipraṇāśo veditavyaḥ ||
788:953: na svayaṃ na parato dvividhakoṭipratikṣepe 'pi gambhīraḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ syāt prāgeva yatra catastro'pi koṭayaḥ pratikṣipyante,
788:962: āhāropastambhaprabhedataścatura āhārān pratītya traidhātuke satvānā mavasthānāt |
788:963: iṣṭāniṣṭagati vibhāgaprabhedataḥ sucarita duścarite pratītya sugatidurgatigamanāt |
788:965: parato vā ghoṣaṃ pratītyādhyātmaṃ ca yoniśo manaskāraṃ samyagdṛṣṭistato yāvatsarvāsravakṣaya iti |
788:970: jarāmaraṇaṃjarāmara[ṇa]samudayo [jarāmaraṇanirodho] jarāmaraṇanirodhagāminī pratipaditi satyavyavasthānamadhikṛtya pratilomanirdeśo veditavyaḥ |
788:972: kasminnasati na jarāmaraṇaṃ bhavati kasya nirodhājjarāmaraṇanirodha iti pratilomanirdeśataḥ ||
788:973: hetupratyaya ālayavijñānaṃ kuśalavāsanā ca sāstravānāstravāṇāṃ ca saṃskārāṇāṃ yathākramam |
788:976: ābhisaṃskārikaṃ prāyogikānāmāyatyāṃ cālaya vijñānāntarasya hetupratyayo draṣṭavyaḥ |
788:979: teṣāṃ lokottarābhyupaga maniṣyandadharmanaimittikatastadvā sanāyā lokottaradharmahetutvaṃ veditavyam ||
788:980: api khalu svabhāvato'pītyevamādinā ṣaḍḍhetavo hetupratyaya iti darśayati |
788:1007: tadyathā bhūtāni bhautikaṃ ceti yathāsaṃbhavaṃ na tvavaśyaṃ sarvatra saṃghāte catvāri mahābhūtāni bhavanti rūpādikaṃ vā bhautikam |
788:1008: ityato yadyatrāsti tattena sahotpadyate nānyonyaṃ vineti ||
788:1015: ye dharmāḥ sahabhāvenālaṃbanaṃ pratipadyante nānyatama vaikalyena te saṃpratipattitaḥ saṃprayuktakaheturvyavasthāpyate,
788:1019: yā aparānte uttarottarā puṣṭataratamā pravṛttiriti taiḥ paripoṣitabījānāṃ tadanvayānāmanāgate kāle viśiṣṭotpattito draṣṭavyā |
788:1021: sarvatragaheturna kevalaṃ sadṛśasyaiva puṣṭaye kiṃ tarhi yasya kasyacidrāgādeḥ kleśasyābhyāsena sarveṣāṃ dveṣādīnāṃ prabandhapuṣṭayā dṛḍhīkāro bhavatyato vandhanagāḍho karaṇānmokṣaprāptiparipanthārthenāsya vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam ||
788:1024: nairantaryasamanantarato'pīti nāvaśyaṃ kṣaṇanairantarya kitarhi cittāntaranairantaryamapyatra nairantarya draṣṭavyam |
788:1025: itarathā hyacittikasamāpattau vyutthānacittasya samāpatticittaṃ na samanantarapratyayaḥ syāt |
788:1027: tasmādekasmin saṃtāne paścimasya cittasya pūrvakaṃ cittaṃ cittāntareṇānantaritaṃ samanantarapratyayaḥ |
788:1029: sabhāgavisabhāgacittacaittotpattisama[na]ntarato'pīti kuśalāḥ cittacettāḥ kuśalānāṃ sabhāgānāmakuśalāvyākṛtānāṃ ca visabhāgānāmanantarotpannānāṃ samanantarapratyayaḥ |
788:1031: tadyathā kāmāvacarā kāmāvacarāṇāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarānāstravāṇāṃ cānantarotpannānāṃ samanantarapratyayaḥ |
788:1032: evaṃ rūpāvacarādayo'pi pṛthagpṛthagrūpāvacarādonāṃ kāmāvacarādīnāṃ cā[na]ntarotpannānāmiti yojayitavyam ||
788:1033: kiṃ khalu sarvasya cintasyānantaraṃ sarva cittamutpadyate,
788:1036: avaitasya cittasyānantaramidaṃ cedaṃ ca cittamutpadyata ityucyamāne bahuvaktavyaṃ jāyate |
788:1038: tadyathā daśabhirbalaiścittasyotpādo veditavyaḥ - paricayabalena chandabalena prayogabalena samāpatti balena''bedhabalena hetubalena viṣayabalena smṛtibalena manaskārabalena pratisaṃdhibalena ca |
788:1045: adhimātreṇa yatheṣṭaṃ sarvāṇi vā vyutkrāmyānulomaṃ pratilomaṃ ca samāpattirveditavyā |
788:1046: chandabalena dvitīyadhyāna lābhī prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpanno yadyākāṃkṣati dvitīyadhyānabhūmikaṃ vyutthānacittamāmukhīkarotyatha nā kāṃkṣati kāmāvacaraṃ kuśalamanivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ vā |
788:1048: prayogabalena kāmāvacarasya kuśalasyavānantaraṃ tatprathamato rūpāvacaraṃ cittamutpadyate |
788:1050: maulasya kuśalasyānantaraṃ dvitīyadhyānasamāpannakamityevamādi vistareṇa yāvadbhavāgrāt veditavyam |
788:1051: samāpattibalena śuddhakaṃ samāpannasya kadācicchuddhaka mevotpadyate kadācitkliṣṭam |
788:1053: tadvirodhi kleśasaṃprayuktasya punaścittasya hetvādibhiśca turbhirbalaiḥ samudācāro veditavyaḥ - tatra tāvaddhetubalena yadyavaśyaṃ bhūmiparihāṇisaṃvartanīyamāvaraṇaṃ pūrvamupacitaṃ bhavati,
788:1054: viṣayabalena yadi rāgādyutpatyanukūlaḥ śubhādinimittaḥ prabhāvotkaṭaviṣaya ābhāsasamāgato bhavati,
788:1057: pratisaṃdhibalena nava maraṇacittānyātmabhāvatṛṣṇāsaṃprayuktāni triṣu dhātuṣupratyekaṃ kāmarūpārūpyāvacarāṇi |
788:1058: tatra kāmadhātoścyutvā kāmadhātāveva pratisaṃdhi vadhnataḥ kāmāvacaramātmabhāvatṛṣṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ maraṇacittaṃ veditavyam |
788:1060: tathā rūpārūpyadhātubhyāṃ cyutvā tatra vānyatra votpadyamānasya ṣaṭcittāni yojayitavyāni |
788:1064: āryāṇāmapyavītarāgāṇāṃ maraṇakāle yāvadaspaṣṭasaṃjñāvasthāṃ na gacchati tāvadasau tṛṣṇā samudācarati |
788:1066: vītarāgāṇāṃ tvāryāṇāṃ pratipakṣasya valīyastvānnaivāsau samudācaratyaprahīṇāpi satī |
788:1073: bodhisattvānāṃ tu praṇidhānabalenopapadyamānānāṃ maraṇacittā dikamekāntena sarva kuśalaṃ veditavyam |
788:1082: savastukaviṣayālaṃbanato dṛṣṭimasmimānaṃ tatsaṃprayuktāṃśca dharmān sthāpayitvā tadanyeṣāmālaṃbanam |
788:1092: ālaṃbanapratyaye viniścayaḥ - lakṣaṇato'pi prabhedato'pi sthiti to'pi parijñānato'pi prahāṇato'pyālavanavyavasthānaṃ veditavyam ||
788:1104: yoniśa ālaṃbanaṃ tadyathā kuśalā nāṃ cittacaitasikānām |
788:1107: sabhāgamālaṃbanaṃ tadyathā kuśalādīnāṃ kuśalādīni svabhūmikānāṃ ca svabhūmikaṃ sāstravāṇāṃ ca sāsravamanāstravāṇāṃ cānāsravam |
788:1108: visa bhāgamālaṃbanaṃ tadyathā kuśalādīnāmakuśalādī nyanyabhūmikānāṃ cānyabhūmikaṃ sāstravānāsravayoścānāsravasāsravam |
788:1121: tattvamālaṃvanaṃ tadyathā tathatā ṣoḍaśānāṃ cākārā ṇāṃ satyāni |
788:1123: vaśa vartyālaṃbanaṃ tadyathā vimokṣādīnāṃ sarvākārajña tāvasānānāṃ guṇānām |
788:1128: caturbhiśca kāraṇairapariniṣpanna mālaṃbanaṃ veditavyam - viruddhavijñāna nimittatayā,
788:1133: trividhaṃ jñānaṃ vaśitā jñānaṃ vipaśyanājñāna nirvikalpajñānaṃ ca |
788:1137: atītā dau tathā svapne pratibiṃbadvaye'pi ca |
788:1151: śrāvakayānāśrayaparivṛttyā skandhadhātvāyatanālaṃbanebhyo vimokṣo na tu teṣu vibhutvalābhaḥ |
788:1159: paurāṇaṃ sāsravakarma vipākasyetyevamādi sahabhāvādhipatitaḥ cittaṃ caitasānām,
788:1173: lokottaraviśudhyadhipatito'nājñāta mājñāsyā mīndriyasyājñendriyasyājñātāvīndriyasya ca vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam,
788:1176: vijñānasahitasya vijñānasādṛśyenendriyasya viṣayeṣu prabandhenotpatteḥ vijñānavṛttisādṛśyārthena tadindriyaṃ sabhāgamityucyate |
788:1178: vijñānena viprayuktasye ndriyasya svātmasādṛśyena prabandhotpattirindriyalakṣaṇasādṛśyārthena tatsabhāgaṃ veditavyam |
788:1194: dharmadhātvāya tanaikadeśaśca jīvitendriyaṃ sukhādīni śraddhādāni pañca ||
788:1195: duḥkhā vedanā duḥkhātmikā satī svenaiva lakṣaṇena duḥkhaduḥkhatāḥ |
788:1197: sukhāyā vedanāyāstadvedanīyānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ vipariṇāmena daurmanasyotpādāt tadvipariṇatirvipariṇāmaduḥkhatā |
788:1198: tatra cānunayena cittasya vipariṇamanaṃ vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā veditavyā |
788:1200: aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā''layavijñānasaṃprayuktā tadvedanīyāśca saṃskārā duḥkhavipariṇāmaduḥkhatayodauṣṭhulyenānugatatvāttena duḥkhatādvayenāvinirmuktatvādekadā duḥkhā vasthāṃ bhajante ekadā sukhāvasthāṃ,
788:1214: ālayavijñānāttadanyattu cakṣurādikaṃ ca sukhaduḥkhādikaṃ ca tadvipākrajamityākhyāṃ labhate tato jātamiti kṛtvā |
788:1233: a saṃskṛtaikadeśaḥ niṣpannasvabhāvaḥ sottaramiti nirvāṇaṃ muktvā,
788:1237: tatra parikalpitaḥ svabhāvaḥ skandhādīnyadhiṣṭhāyāvidyamāna ātmādisvabhāvo yaḥ parikalpitaḥ |
788:1238: paratantraḥ svabhāvastānyeva skandhādīni yatrāsāvātma dyabhūtavikalpaḥ pravṛttaḥ |
788:1249: lakṣaṇasaṃgraheṇa rūpaskandho rūpaskandhenaiva saṃgṛhīto vistareṇa yāvaddharmāyatanaṃ dharmāyata[ne]naiva |
788:1252: jātisaṃgraheṇa skandhaiḥ rāśyādyarthayuktā rūpādayaḥ sarve saṃgṛhītā vilakṣaṇā apyanyonyaṃ svalakṣaṇenaikajātīyatvāt |
788:1254: avasthāsaṃgraheṇa skandhā ekajātīyā api sukhādyavasthāṃ niyamayya sukhāvasthāḥ sukhāvasthaireva saṃgṛhītā na duḥkhādyavasthaiḥ |
788:1256: yathā skandhā evaṃ dhātava āyatanāni ca |
788:1257: sahāyasaṃgraheṇa rūpaskandhaḥ saha tadāśritairvedanādibhiḥ sahāyairgṛhyamāṇaḥ pañcabhiḥ skandhaiḥ saṃgṛhītaḥ |
788:1258: evaṃ vedanādayā'pi pratyekaṃ saparivārā gṛhyamāṇāḥ pañcabhiḥ skandhaiḥ saṃgṛhītā bhavanti |
788:1259: tathā dhātava āyatanāni ca saparivārāṇi pratyekaṃ sarvardhātubhirāyataneśca saṃgṛhītāni veditavyāni |
788:1264: evaṃ kṛtvā yāvanto dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ sūtrāntareṣu teṣāmanyatamasaṃgraha ekadeśasaṃgraho veditavyaḥ |
788:1268: evaṃ kṛtvā yāvanto dharmāḥ skandha dhātvāyatanaṃḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ sūtrāntareṣu teṣāmaśeṣataḥ saṃgrahaḥ sakalasaṃgraho veditavyaḥ |
788:1270: yathāyogamevaṃ dhātavaḥ skandhāyatanarāyatanāni skandhadhātubhiḥ saṃgṛhītāni [iti] vistareṇāvagantavyam ||
788:1274: araṇyasaṃgṛhītā mṛgā iti loke ucyate tathehāpi cakṣurādibhiḥ cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ |
788:1275: nibandhasaṃgraho yathā rajjvādinā kāṣṭhabhārādikasya tathā kāyena cakṣurādonāmindriyāṇām |
788:1276: tulyārthasaṃgraho yathā samānasarvaprayojanānāṃ vistrambhiṇāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ parasparaṃ tarthakālaṃvanapravṛttānāṃ saṃprayuktānāmānyonyam |
788:1277: upādānasaṃgraho yathā svāminā ātmīyataḥ parigrahītādīnā dāsādīnāṃ tathālayavijñānenātmabhāvasya |
788:1278: avisārasaṃgraho yathā ghaṭenodakasya tathā samādhinā tadanyeṣāṃ cittacaitasikānām |
788:1279: abhisaṃkṣepa[saṃ]graho yathā samudreṇa nadīnāṃ tathā rūpaskandhena cakṣurādonāmiti |
788:1281: paramāṇudeśe sarveṣāṃ deśināmityekaparamāṇuparyāpannānāṃ rūpādīnāmavinirbhāgaḥ samānadeśatvena veditavyaḥ |
788:1282: paramāṇorūrdhva sarveṣāṃ deśināṃ miśrībhāvaḥ tadyathā kaluṣe pānīye appṛthivīparamāṇūnāṃ paramparam |
788:1283: deśināmeva samudāyināmanyonyaṃ samavadhānaṃ tadyathā bhittau mṛtpiṇḍena mṛtpiṇḍāntarasya |
788:1286: saṃpratipattisaṃprayogaḥ parabhāvena na svabhāvena tadyathā cittaṃ cittāntareṇa na saṃprayujyate,
788:1291: sarvatragaḥ saṃpratipattisaṃprayoga vedanādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ sarvāsvavasthāsveṣāṃ vinānyonya mabhāvāt |
788:1292: ucitastadekatyānāṃ ca śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāmityekāntalaukikānāṃ kuśalānāmakuśalāvyākṛtānāṃ ca yathāsaṃbhavam |
788:1294: samanvāgamo lakṣaṇataḥ pūrvavattadyathā kuśalādīnāṃ dharmāṇāmācayāpacaye prāptiḥ pratilambhaḥ samanvāgama iti prajñaptiḥ |
788:1295: bījasamanvāgama iti kāmadhātau jātau bhūtastraidhātukaiḥ kleśopakleśaiḥ samanvāgata ityavītarāgaṃ pṛthagjanamadhikṛtyaitadvaiditavyam |
788:1296: vītarāgastu tatrordhva vā jāto yato bhūmervītarāgastadbhūmikairasamanvāgataḥ samanvāgataśca,
788:1300: yasya yasya prakārasya pratipakṣa utpanna iti bhāva nāprahātavyasyādhimātrādeḥ kleśasya |
788:1302: vaśitāsamanvāgamaḥ prāyogikānāṃ kuśalānāmiti śrutamayādīnāṃ satyapi bīje tadabhyāsakṛtāṃ tajjanmikīṃ bījapuṣṭimantareṇa saṃmukhīkartumaśakyatvāt |
